title: Example Note Title
text:
--You can edit this note and save it by clicking the save icon in the upper right corner! (this will save a new note, and delete the existing one!)

--You can create a new note (without saving the open note) by clicking the pencil icon in the upper right corner.

--You can select an existing note to view (without saving the open note) by clicking on the note card in the left column.
